notices.title: (aws-eks): Regression in installing Helm charts from assets
notices.overview: Helm charts fail to install when provided as an asset. This issue does not affect charts installed from a repository.

notices.title: AWS CDK v1 has entered maintenance mode
notices.overview:
AWS CDK v1 has entered maintenance mode on June 1, 2022. Migrate to AWS CDK v2 to continue to get the latest features and fixes!

 See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/v2/guide/migrating-v2.html
